EmailTemplate.name: RE: Lawrence, Gary Bettger Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (136242
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Lawrence, Gary Bettger Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (1362428863.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Larry, Nice to meet you via email, I would love to connect with you. Please feel free to schedule a time <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> that is convenient for you via my online calendar. Until then,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Lawrence Verbiest [mailto:lawrence.verbiest@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, March 04, 2013 3:21 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Lawrence, Gary Bettger Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners Hello Sara, I spoke with Gary Bettger last Friday about MBO Partners and I am interested in learning more. Can I schedule a time to speak with you to learn more? Please let me know. Thanks, LarryOn Fri, Mar 1, 2013 at 2:31 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:To view this email as a web page, click here <http://info.mbopartners.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> Dear Lawrence, I’ve been using MBO for some time and thought you might be interested in their services too. Check them out when you get a second. Gary Bettger We received your contact information from Gary Bettger, a current member of MBO Partners who believes you could greatly benefit from our program. My name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor, and I invite you to learn what MBO Partners is all about <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Gary%20Bettger&re=Lawrence&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>, and decide for yourself. For more than 25 years, our company has led the independent consulting sector in America. Our mission is simple –we make it easy for independent consultants and their clients to work together by handling the administrative, financial, legal, tax and expense burdens that bog down consultants, thus increasing their billable time. In addition, we provide them access to the largest exclusive online community of successful independent consultants, the clients that engage with them, and a multitude of valuable resources. Click here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Gary%20Bettger&re=Lawrence&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> to learn more about what MBO Partners can do for independent consultants. Here are some recent tools we have developed to empower our consultants to thrive in their independent careers that you might find useful: - Bill Rate Packet <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D#billrate> – Not sure what to bill your clients? This tool will assist you, factoring in your desired profit margins, expected expenses, and projected insurance costs. - Webinar Index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?type=presentation&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> – Learn from industry experts advising on best practices to help you expand your consulting business. - Meet the Independents <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> – Get a glimpse into the independent workforce in America by reading the profiles and stories of some of our consultants. - Independent’s Guide <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> – Take advantage of an online library of articles and resources covering a myriad of topics and issues geared specifically towards the independent career path.
You may also wish to sign-up for our monthly Independent Consulting Brief <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mpages/ch-2012-04-01/ic-newsletter.html?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=ICB%2B-%2BMZ%2BTwitter%2BPost&utm_campaign=ICB%2B-%2BMZ%2BTwitter%2BPost&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> to stay up to date on the many resources that we provide to the consulting marketplace. I wish you every success in growing or starting your own independent consulting business, and if you’d like to set up a time to talk to learn more, please feel free to schedule a time <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> that is convenient for you to speak with me. Regards, ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6028 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6028> f: 703-793-6070 <tel:703-793-6070> e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjA2MTUmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMjA3MTYmZW1haWxpZD1sYXdyZW5jZS52ZXJiaWVzdEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTMzNzA5LTE0OTU2ODAtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://info.mbopartners.com/SubscriptionManagement.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRoks6TPZKXonjHpfsX57%2BUoX6%2B2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
